external_games.name: 逃家少女~蜜梨與巧克力~

name: Runaway Home: Mili and Chocolate
summary: "Runaway Home: Mili and Chocolate" is a romance visual novel game. On your usual way home, you come across a runaway girl on the roadside. What follows is a heart-pounding cohabitation, and a gradual revelation of the girl's mysterious past.
